lead_paragraph: The Philippine president’s remarks to a group of business leaders were the clearest signal yet that he wants to renegotiate a military deal with the United States.

byline.contributor: Makiko Inoue and Hisako Ueno contributed reporting from Tokyo, and Felipe Villamor from Manila.

headline.main: Rodrigo Duterte, in Japan, Calls for U.S. Troops to Exit Philippines in 2 Years

snippet: The Philippine president’s remarks to a group of business leaders were the clearest signal yet that he wants to renegotiate a military deal with the United States....
